mapper.insert: INSERT INTO candidate(ACCOUNT, AGE, BIRTHDAY, WORKSTATUS, DEGREECATEGORY, EMAIL, FRESHGRADUATE, GENDER, ADDRESS, NAME, STARTWORKDATE, TINY, WEIXINBLUR, DESIRED_SALARY, WORKYEARS, RESUME, APPLICANT_ID, DESIRED_CITY, DESIRED_INDUSTRY, DESIRED_POSITION, SKILLS_INTRODUCTION) VALUE (#{account},#{age},#{birthday},#{workstatus},#{degreecategory},#{email},#{freshgraduate},#{gender},#{address},#{name},#{startworkdate},#{tiny},#{weixinblur},#{desiredSalary},#{workyears},#{resume},#{applicantId},#{desiredCity},#{desiredIndustry},#{desiredPosition},#{skillsIntroduction})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.boos_name,c.boos_email,c.boos_phone,c.company_id,c.boos_img,c.company_position, b.company_name,b.location,b.industry,b.established_year,b.contact_number,b.email,b.company_img,b.company_scale,b.company_market,b.company_type FROM job a JOIN boos c ON a.boos_id = c.id -- 连接 job 表和 boos 表 JOIN company b ON c.company_id = b.id -- 连接 boos 表和 company 表 WHERE a.id = #{jobId}; -- 根据 job 的 ID 进行过滤
